New York City Stay | The Kimberley Hotel | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP New York City Stay 5 nights | New York Known as the " City That Never Sleeps ," New York offers an unparalleled mix of iconic landmarks, such as the Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, and Central Park, which are symbols of American culture and history. The city's diverse neighbourhoods, from the artistic streets of SoHo to the vibrant energy of Times Square, showcase a melting pot of cultures that enriches visitors' understanding and appreciation of global communities. New York's world-renowned culinary scene, Broadway shows, and museums like the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Museum of Modern Art provide endless entertainment and educational opportunities. The unique blend of historic significance, cultural diversity, and dynamic urban life makes New York City a bucket-list destination that promises memorable experiences for every visitor. Deal Details Travel Dates 1-15 Sep & 26 Sep-30 Oct 2024 Priced From $2,809 per person Enquire Now Known as the " City That Never Sleeps ," New York offers an unparalleled mix of iconic landmarks, such as the Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, and Central Park, which are symbols of American culture and history. The city's diverse neighbourhoods, from the artistic streets of SoHo to the vibrant energy of Times Square, showcase a melting pot of cultures that enriches visitors' understanding and appreciation of global communities. New York's world-renowned culinary scene, Broadway shows, and museums like the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Museum of Modern Art provide endless entertainment and educational opportunities. The unique blend of historic significance, cultural diversity, and dynamic urban life makes New York City a bucket-list destination that promises memorable experiences for every visitor. Inclusions Your New York City Stay includes: 5 nights accommodation in a Deluxe Room King Bed at The Kimberly Hotel. Airfares are additional. ADD ON Tours No visit to New York City is complete without exploring the iconic Brooklyn Bridge. Delve into the history of neighbourhoods like DUMBO and Brooklyn Heights alongside a knowledgeable local guide, marvel at the architectural marvel of the Brooklyn Bridge from both its elevated walkway and the bustling streets below. Dive into the vibrant culinary scene of Brooklyn, savouring its diverse flavours while immersing yourself in the borough's rich culinary culture. Or, how about an exclusive insight into the inner workings of a musical theatre company with a behind-the-scenes tour of a bustling off-Broadway rehearsal studio? This tour offers a unique glimpse into the daily routines and creative processes of the industry. Brooklyn Bridge & Dumbo Food Tour from $375* per person Broadway Behind-the-Scenes Experience from $105* per person Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy or family share where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, a credit card processing fee applies. World Travellers reserve the right to correct any errors or omissions at any time. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable to each of our partners featured. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details of any offer featured in this publication. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
